an9.61:4.2: Kittāvatā nu kho, āvuso, anupubbanirodho vutto bhagavatā”ti?
an9.61:5.3: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, anupubbanirodho vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena … pe ….
an9.61:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
an9.61:6.2: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, anupubbanirodho vutto bhagavatā nippariyāyenā”ti.
